// Contents of address memory		       
000000000000 (000) 00 NOOP
111001000000 (E40) 01 LBI ACC, Mem[Mem[64]]      # DM[64] = 1, DM[1] = 1
101000000010 (A02) 02 ADD d[02]
110100000010 (D02) 03 SB d[02]
101100000001 (B01) 04 SUB d[01]
110100000001 (D01) 05 SB d[1] 
011101000001 (741) 06 CMP d[65] 	    	 # DM[65] = 89
010110000110 (586) 07 JNE -6



# Start an endless loop
000000000000 (000) 18 NOOP
101101000001 (B41) 19 SUB d[65]
011010000001 (681) 20 JZ -1
001110010110 (918) 21 MOV -22
010000000000 (400) 22 J
